work.summary: Headless e-commerce platform for jewelry brand, built with Shopify Storefront & Admin APIs. Custom product pages, cart, checkout, and order sync.
details: Headless architecture: React (Vite) frontend consuming Shopify Storefront API; secure Node proxy for sensitive Admin API operations.
Product catalogue with variants, filtering and collection views; client side cart synced to Shopify checkout.
Admin API jobs + webhooks for order/inventory updates; graceful retry & error handling for resiliency.
Reusable UI components and design tokens; responsive layouts and accessible interactions (keyboard/focus states).
Environment-based configuration and secrets; deployed on Vercel with preview builds and caching where appropriate.
Content and settings structured for easy updates (brand copy, navigation, featured products) without code changes.
